begin Example_NPC_Stuff

;this is an example script for several things you can do with an NPC


;************************************************************************
;
;		Add a journal entry if Killed
;
;************************************************************************

	If ( OnDeath == 1 )
			Journal "11111 test journal", 10
	endif



;************************************************************************
;
;		Add a journal entry if following NPC is Killed
;
;************************************************************************

	if ( GetCurrentAiPackage == 3 )		;following
		If ( OnDeath == 1 )
				Journal "11111 test journal", 10
		endif
	endif


;************************************************************************
;
;		Make NPC complain every half day if being escorted
;
;************************************************************************

	float timer
	short bother		;this flag gets set here, but should be reset in the dialogue results


	if ( GetCurrentAiPackage != 3 )
		return
	endif

	set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed
		
	if ( timer > 720 )	;12 minutes
		set bother to ( bother + 1 )		;this will get reset in dialogue
		set timer to 0
		if ( GetDistance Player < 512 )
			ForceGreeting
		endif
	endif


;************************************************************************
;
;		Make NPC follow you after knocking them out
;
;************************************************************************

	if ( OnKnockout == 1)
			
			StopCombat
			SetFight 0
			AiFollow, Player, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0

	endif


;************************************************************************
;
;		Make something appear in inventory when killed
;
;************************************************************************

	if ( OnDeath == 1 )

		AddItem, "Gold_001", 100

	endif


;************************************************************************
;
;		have a specific guy attack specific NPC if following the player
;
;		in this example this script would be on Ken, and Todd is the attacker
;
;************************************************************************

	if ( GetCurrentAiPackage == 3 )		;following, assumed to be following the player, but may not be

		If ( GetDistance, "Todd" < 500 )		;get within 500 units of Todd
				
			"Todd"->StartCombat, "Ken"	;this makes Todd attack Ken

		endif

	endif


;************************************************************************
;
;		Check for spell effect on PC and force a greeting
;		NOTE: as of 7/28/01, the geteffect command is not in yet
;
;************************************************************************

;	if ( GetEffect, 37 )		;check for effect, see Enum list in help file
;		ForceGreeting
;	endif

;doug says:

	if ( GetSpellEffects Droops == 1 )
		ForceGreeting
	endif



end Example_NPC_Stuff
